#summary &igrave character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesI

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesI I] > &igrave

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Igrave;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00cc/index.htm U+000CC].
  * `&Igrave` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00cc/index.htm U+000CC].
  * `&igrave;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ec/index.htm U+000EC].
  * `&igrave` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ec/index.htm U+000EC].
